page.title: 12VISIT TO A FACTORY (2)
page.content: KEEPSAKE MAKES JEWELLERY BOXES.THE JEWELLERY BOXES GET SOLD AT HEUER, OR PRESTON'S OF BOLTON. THERE ARE THREE WORKERS IN KEEPSAKE. THEY WORK FROM 8.30am TO 5.00pm FOR FOUR DAYS, BUT ON FRIDAYS THEY CLOSE AT 12.30pm. THEY HAVE FIVE MACHINES TO MAKE THE JEWELLERY BOXES. THEY ARE THE CLICK PRESS WHICH CUTS OUT THE CARD,THREE HOT DIE STAMPING MACHINES WHICH PUT THE COLOURED LETTERING ON, AND A FOLDING MACHINE. THEY CHOSE TO CALL THE FACTORY KEEPSAKE BECAUSE IT IS EASY TO REMEMBER. THEY WERE GOING TO CALL IT "CREATION SUISSE" WHICH MEANS SWISS CREATIONS. JULIE OPENED THE FACTORY HERE BECAUSE SHE LIVES IN MILLOM. SHE OPENED THE FACTORY IN 1979. SHE ENJOYS HER JOB VERY MUCH.
